name: Emergency Treatment Laboratory
raw: ------------------------------ Ingredients ------------------------------ #L "Antiseptic Jar" "154330" #L "Mimicking Cellular Oil" "154268" #L "Revitalizing Serum" "154344" #L "Blood Plasma" "154359" #L "Recipe" "/tell recipe 20" #L "Treatment Laboratory Bot-Injector" "154340" ------------------------------ Recipe ------------------------------ Mimicking Cellular Oil + Antiseptic Jar = #L "Jar of Mimicking Cellular Oil" "154334" Skills: | PT | ------------------------------ Revitalizing Serum + Jar of Mimicking Cellular Oil = #L "Jar of Prepared Serum" "154336" Skills: | PT | ------------------------------ Blood Plasma + Jar of Prepared Serum = #L "Jar of Transient Fluid" "154338" Skills: | PT | ------------------------------ Jar of Transient Fluid + Treatment Laboratory Bot-Injector = #L "Emergency Treatment Laboratory" "154328" Skills: | PT | ------------------------------ Comments ------------------------------ Theses Emergency Treatment Laboratory are extremeley efficient and can be sold very high. Sadly, the cost of the ingredients involved to make them is really high too...
